nodes.text: Dianoga pie was the most popular of the dishes made of dianoga meat. The savory pie had a beige crust, was stuffed with a filling, and was edible by Wookiees. At some point, a field guide for officers of the Galactic Empire noted that Imperial chefs could use dianogas to make a tasty pie, although troops were unlikely to come back for seconds. The pies, when served with krayt milk, were the house special at the Meltdown Café on the planet Nar Shaddaa.

In 10 ABY, the Wookiee Rebel Chewbacca visited the café. The bartender there asked him what he wanted to eat, but as he did not understand the Wookiee language, he simply gave a slice of dianoga pie and a cup filled with krayt milk to Chewbacca, noting that the pie would be tasty.
Dianoga pie first appeared in the second issue of the Star Wars: Dark Empire II comic book series, which was written by Tom Veitch, illustrated by Cam Kennedy, and published on January 24, 1995.
